birth_place.zh-cn: 大清四川省顺庆府南充县
birth_place.en: Nanchong County, Shunqing Prefecture, Sichuan Province, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 西德巴登-符腾堡州海德堡

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国副国级领导人之一，无产阶级革命家、军事家。曾任中共中央书记处书记、国务院副总理、解放军总参谋长、中华人民共和国公安部首任部长等职，被授予中国人民解放军大将军衔。
description.en: One of the sub-national leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a proletarian revolutionary and military strategist. He served as Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, Vice Premier of the State Council, Chief of the General Staff of the PLA, and the first Minister of Public Security of the PRC. He was awarded the rank of PLA General.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, former Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任代总参谋长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Acting Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中华人民共和国公安部部长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of Public Security of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿的第三任妻子。
description.en: The third wife of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿的儿子。
description.en: Son of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿的儿子。
description.en: Son of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的著名军事学校。
description.en: A famous military academy during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national public security work.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的最高军事指挥机关，负责组织领导全国武装力量的军事建设和作战指挥。
description.en: Formerly the highest military command organ of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, responsible for organizing and leading the military construction and combat command of the national armed forces.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

en: Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的公安主管机关，后改组为中华人民共和国公安部。
description.en: The public security authority in the early days of the People's Republic of China, later reorganized into the Ministry of Public Security of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命前夕，时任解放军总参谋长罗瑞卿被林彪等人指控“反党篡军”而遭批判、撤职的政治事件。
description.en: A political incident on the eve of the Cultural Revolution, where the then PLA Chief of General Staff Luo Ruiqing was accused by Lin Biao and others of 'opposing the Party and usurping the army,' leading to his criticism and dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期党员，介绍了罗瑞卿加入中国共产党。
description.en: An early member of the Communist Party of China who introduced Luo Ruiqing to the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人，曾任中共中央军委工作人员。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who once worked for the CPC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中共中央副主席、国务院副总理、国防部长。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，林彪反革命集团主犯之一。
description.en: An Air Force General of the People's Liberation Army, one of the main culprits of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，林彪反革命集团主犯之一。
description.en: A Navy Vice Admiral of the People's Liberation Army, one of the main culprits of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议上，罗瑞卿受到批判，是“罗瑞卿事件”的关键环节。
description.en: At this conference, Luo Ruiqing was criticized, which was a key part of the 'Luo Ruiqing Incident'.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席、中共中央副主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the People's Republic of China and Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，曾任中宣部部长。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, former head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席、中共中央军委副主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the People's Republic of China and Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission.

en: Rehabilitation of unjust, false, and wrongful cases

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，中国共产党对在历次政治运动中受迫害的干部和群众进行平反昭雪的政治行动。
description.en: After the end of the Cultural Revolution, a political action by the Communist Party of China to rehabilitate cadres and masses who were persecuted in previous political movements.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of the reform and opening-up policy.

nodes.id: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

zh-cn: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
en: Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth

description.zh-cn: 1978年在中国思想解放运动中发表的一篇重要文章，引发了关于真理标准问题的大讨论。
description.en: An important article published during the ideological emancipation movement in China in 1978, which triggered a major discussion on the criterion of truth.

en: The discussion on the criterion of truth

description.zh-cn: 一场关于实践是检验真理的唯一标准的大讨论，是中国的一次思想解放运动。
description.en: A major discussion about practice being the sole criterion for testing truth, which was an ideological emancipation movement in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿的出生地，位于四川省。
description.en: The birthplace of Luo Ruiqing, located in Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿的逝世地，位于西德巴登-符腾堡州。
description.en: The place of death of Luo Ruiqing, located in Heidelberg, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿接替黄克诚担任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: Luo Ruiqing succeeded Huang Kecheng as the Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿被免去总参谋长职务后，由杨成武代理。
description.en: After Luo Ruiqing was dismissed from his post as Chief of the General Staff, Yang Chengwu served as the acting chief.

description.zh-cn: 谢富治接替罗瑞卿担任中华人民共和国公安部部长。
description.en: Xie Fuzhi succeeded Luo Ruiqing as the Minister of Public Security of the PRC.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部
中国人民解放军总参谋部

description.zh-cn: 经任伯芳介绍，罗瑞卿与中共中央军委工作人员接头，并转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Through Ren Bofang's introduction, Luo Ruiqing met with staff from the CPC Central Military Commission and became a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，因罗瑞卿事件而被批判，后跳楼负重伤，并被撤销全部职务及监护。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, he was criticized due to the Luo Ruiqing Incident, suffered severe injuries from a suicide attempt by jumping from a building, was dismissed from all his posts, and placed under surveillance.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件中，罗瑞卿被指责为“反对突出政治”、“反对林彪”，随后被调离军事工作领导岗位并受到批判。
description.en: In the Luo Ruiqing Incident, Luo was accused of 'opposing the prominence of politics' and 'opposing Lin Biao,' and was subsequently removed from his military leadership position and criticized.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委内部日渐分裂，林彪与罗瑞卿分属不同派别，最终在1965年12月的上海会议上，林彪等人对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: The Central Military Commission gradually split, with Lin Biao and Luo Ruiqing in opposing factions. This culminated in the Shanghai Conference of December 1965, where Lin Biao and others launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，叶群与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Ye Qun, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，吴法宪与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Wu Faxian, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，李作鹏与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Li Zuopeng, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，贺龙、罗瑞卿为首的一派与林彪等人对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with one led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing in opposition to Lin Biao and others.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，叶剑英与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Ye Jianying, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，聂荣臻与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Nie Rongzhen, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，杨成武与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Yang Chengwu, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东首肯了林彪等人对罗瑞卿的攻击，导致罗瑞卿事件的发生。
description.en: Mao Zedong approved the attack on Luo Ruiqing by Lin Biao and others, which led to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东表示其是“听了林彪一面之辞，错整了罗瑞卿”，为罗瑞卿的平反奠定了基础。
description.en: Mao Zedong stated that he had 'wrongly purged Luo Ruiqing based on Lin Biao's one-sided account,' laying the groundwork for Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 在京西宾馆会议上，罗瑞卿被挂上“篡军反党”、“反对毛主席”、“反对毛泽东思想”而受到批判。
description.en: At the Jingxi Hotel Conference, Luo Ruiqing was criticized under the labels of 'usurping the army and opposing the Party,' 'opposing Chairman Mao,' and 'opposing Mao Zedong Thought'.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”，并决定停止和撤销罗瑞卿的全部职务。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun, and decided to suspend and dismiss Luo Ruiqing from all his posts.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun.

description.zh-cn: “文化大革命”结束后，罗瑞卿在政治上得到平反。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution ended, Luo Ruiqing was politically rehabilitated.

relationships.source: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 该文章的发表引发了关于真理标准问题的大讨论。
description.en: The publication of this article triggered the great discussion on the criterion of truth.

description.zh-cn: 促成《马克思主义的一个最基本的原则》在《解放军报》上发表，推动了“真理标准大讨论”的开展。
description.en: He facilitated the publication of 'A Most Fundamental Principle of Marxism' in the 'Liberation Army Daily', promoting the 'great discussion on the criterion of truth'.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿逝世后，邓小平前往机场迎灵，并于8月12日的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: After Luo Ruiqing's death, Deng Xiaoping went to the airport to receive his remains and delivered the eulogy at the memorial service on August 12.

description.zh-cn: 因叶剑英就罗瑞卿跳楼一事作诗表达同情，周恩来严厉批判其“完全站到罗瑞卿一边”。
description.en: Because Ye Jianying wrote a poem expressing sympathy for Luo Ruiqing's suicide attempt, Zhou Enlai severely criticized him for 'completely siding with Luo Ruiqing'.
